data.title: Mohit Malhotra
data.text:
Indian television actor

Mohit Malhotra is an Indian film and television actor. known for his participation in Splitsvilla 2 and his portrayal of Kartik Sharma in Bade Achhe Lagte Hain and Sid in Sasural Genda Phool. He made his film debut through Vikram Bhatt's psychological thriller Hacked.

Career

[edit]

Malhotra started his career as lead contestant with MTV's Splitsvilla 2 and appeared as the male protagonist in Mitwa Phool Kamal Ke as Birju.

In 2010, he appeared in Sasural Genda Phool as a Sid. In 2011, he was cast in Bade Achhe Lagte Hain as Kartik.[1] In 2012, Malhotra played Vihaan in Kya Hua Tera Vaada and Ayaz in Gumrah: End of Innocence.

In 2013, he hosted as an anchor India's Dancing Superstar. He was also a part of Bindass' Mentals. In 2014, he also played a protagonist in anthology series Yeh Hai Aashiqui.[2] Next, he portrayed Zubair Qureshi in Colors TV's Beintehaa.[3]

In 2015, Malhotra played Yash as a parallel lead in Zee TV's Jamai Raja.[4] In 2017, he played a protagonist as abhishek in &TV's Chupke Chupke. In 2018, he was seen as Raj in &TV's anthology horror series Laal Ishq.[5]

From 2018 to 2019, he played a protagonist as Akarsh in &TV's Daayan.[6][7] In 2020, he made his film debut in Vikram Bhatt's psychological thriller Hacked, opposite Hina Khan.[8] In 2020, Mohit started his production house "Roots Entertainment" and music label "Roots Music' and also worked in Naagin 5 as Adi Naag Hirday alongside Hina Khan.
